transcript: to be fair I was only there for four days because the hurricane came the next day and we didn't go back I mean I had a friend that he went there and he did the whole thing he was traveling back and forth to Florida every weekend two flights a week every week for the whole year so he could keep his his thing I was like do you think if you didn't have a hundred flights a year you would be able to make up the 30 that you're paying in Texas and I was like and I was like and you'd be able to just live where you want to live there's a part of me that just loves making more money and I would prefer to pay fewer taxes like I would but I think that her logic is sound which is why have all the money in the world if you can't live where you want to live in the world that's kind of the big picture at least for me
